newsitem.title: USA: IPO FILING-Schuff files 2.2 mln shr offer.
newsitem.headline: IPO FILING-Schuff files 2.2 mln shr offer.

text.p: Schuff Steel Co filed Thursday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission an initial public offering of up to 2.2 million common shares, it expects will sell at $10 to $12 each.

The Phoenix-based provider of steel construction services said proceeds will be used to make a special distribution to current shareholders, to purchase equipment and for other general corporate needs.
Underwriters for the offering, Principal Financial Securities Inc, have an over-allotment option of up to 330,000 shares.
After the offering, the company will have 7.2 million shares outstanding.
The company reported 1996 revenue of $103.9 million, up from $62 million in 1995.
